name: illume
description: Get a pair of streams that emit the names of the active sections

scripts.test-electron: npm run build && browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify ] | tape-run | faucet
scripts.test-chrome: npm run build && browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify ] | tape-run --browser chrome | faucet
scripts.test-safari: npm run build && browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify ] | tape-run --browser safari | faucet
scripts.test-firefox: npm run build && browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify ] | tape-run --browser firefox | faucet

author: Standard Library
